events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but it arrived the wrong size. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a Refund request due to a wrong size delivery and customer wants to return the product.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah, who handles refund and return requests for the clothing category.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong jacket size and would like a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for us to process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unworn and packed exactly as it arrived with all tags attached.
Thank you for the details. We can issue a return shipping label for you, and once we receive the jacket, a full refund will be credited back to your original payment method.
That sounds perfect, thank you. I appreciate how quickly you're handling this.
The return label has been sent to your email. If you send the jacket back within 14 days, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund for the jacket return. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund appeared in my account yesterday. Thanks for the excellent customer service!
We’re glad to hear that the refund was successful. We will now close this case. Thank you for choosing our store.
You will shortly receive a survey to rate your experience with our support team. Your feedback is very important to us.
